page.title: 18ABBEY MIDDLE SCHOOL DUNSCROF
page.content: Our school is divided into 4 years:- 1st year aged 4-10, 2nd year 10-11, 3rd 11-12, 4th 12-13. There are 2 or 3 classes in each year each with about 17 pupils. The school has 10 teachers, a Headmaster, Deputy Head, secretary, and non-teaching assistant who looks after the resources area. We have 2 playtimes a day and a dinner break. The school has a library where you can borrow books through the week. The main lessons are Maths and English. We have Houses, each has a colour, green, blue, and yellow. These compete in sports and class activities. CONTRIBUTORS-Staff.Mr R MIDDLETON, Mr C WALL,Mrs S FLOY, Mr R BARKER. Pupils- J ATKINSON, D DYKES, K KERRISON,T WILLIAMS, N PASS, L PARKIN , R CULL, J BEVERIDGE, N BACON ,M HAYTHORNE.
